casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shannon Dale ISOM 265P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 4, 2017 Kirby H. Smith, III, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for Isom, Shannon Dale. Melody R. Hairston, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of August 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of August 2017."
